con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="catify rest api TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Report to Generate" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="soapui-setings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="pipeline TestCase"/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> </xml-fragment>

con:request.name: deployProcess
con:request.con:request: <process processVersion="1.0" processName="process01" accountName="sbk" xmlns="http://www.catify.com/api/1.0" xmlns:n1="http://www.catify.com/api/1.0" > <start n1:name="start"/> <request n1:name="bam_step_01"/> <receive n1:name="wait_for_payload"> <timeEvent n1:time="60000"> <request n1:name="throw_time_out_exception"/> <end n1:name="end_time_out"/> </timeEvent> </receive> <request n1:name="bam_step_02"/> <end n1:name="end"/> </process>

con:request.name: deployPipelineForProcessStart
con:request.con:request: <routes xmlns="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring"> <route id="in-68106b1419878a5415672183c94b2f32"> <from uri="file:../files?delete=true"/> <log message="consuming file..."/> <setHeader headerName="catify_accountName"> <constant>sbk</constant> </setHeader> <setHeader headerName="catify_processName"> <constant>process01</constant> </setHeader> <setHeader headerName="catify_processVersion"> <constant>1.0</constant> </setHeader> <setHeader headerName="catify_taskId"> <constant>start</constant> </setHeader> <process ref="processIdProcessor"/> <split stopOnException="false" streaming="true"> <tokenize token="\n"/> <process ref="csvMarshallProcessor"/> <process ref="initProcessProcessor"/> <log message="started: ${header.catify_instanceId}"/> <to uri="activemq:queue:in_queue"/> </split> </route> </routes>

con:testSuite.name: catify rest api TestSuite
con:testSuite.con:description: TestSuite generated for REST Service [catify rest api]

con:testCase.name: process TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [process] located at [/deploy_process]

con:testCase.name: pipeline TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [pipeline] located at [/deploy_pipeline]

con:restRequest.name: deployProcess
con:restRequest.con:request: <process processVersion="1.0" processName="process01" accountName="sbk" xmlns="http://www.catify.com/api/1.0" xmlns:n1="http://www.catify.com/api/1.0" > <start n1:name="start"/> <request n1:name="bam_step_01"/> <receive n1:name="wait_for_payload"> <timeEvent n1:time="60000"> <request n1:name="throw_time_out_exception"/> <end n1:name="end_time_out"/> </timeEvent> </receive> <request n1:name="bam_step_02"/> <end n1:name="end"/> </process>

con:restRequest.name: deployPipelineForProcessStart
con:restRequest.con:request: <routes xmlns="http://camel.apache.org/schema/spring"> <route id="in-68106b1419878a5415672183c94b2f32"> <from uri="file:../files?delete=true"/> <log message="consuming file..."/> <setHeader headerName="catify_accountName"> <constant>sbk</constant> </setHeader> <setHeader headerName="catify_processName"> <constant>process01</constant> </setHeader> <setHeader headerName="catify_processVersion"> <constant>1.0</constant> </setHeader> <setHeader headerName="catify_taskId"> <constant>start</constant> </setHeader> <process ref="processIdProcessor"/> <split stopOnException="false" streaming="true"> <tokenize token="\n"/> <process ref="csvMarshallProcessor"/> <process ref="initProcessProcessor"/> <setBody> <simple>${header.catify_instanceId}</simple> </setBody> <log message="started --> ${body}"/> <to uri="activemq:queue:in_queue"/> </split> </route> </routes>
